level.heading: Withdrawal deemed on conversion to domestic filing entity or domestic limited liability partnership.
level.text: A qualified foreign entity registered to do business in the District which converts to any type of domestic filing entity or to a domestic registered limited liability partnership shall be deemed to have withdrawn its registration on the effective date of the conversion.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
